snippet.title: Battle Talent Quest Version Official Trailer
snippet.description:
We are proud to announce the release of Battle Talent on Meta stores on June 1st, available for only $19.99!

Real Combat, Virtual World: The Next-Gen of Melee Combat

With the advanced physics system, our team has been pushing the boundaries of the VR action category to deliver an experience unlike any other. Say goodbye to sluggish AI bots and hello to flexible, pressure-filled enemies who attack coherent strikes. Prepare for increasingly challenging battles as each level becomes more difficult, pushing you to practice and improve your skills to emerge victorious.

Get ready to step into a world where combat is no longer just a game, but a true test of your Battle Talent.
